entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.2°C

Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 55 %

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
